content_en.policy_scope: This policy applies to personal expense reimbursement for employees of Antalpha and affiliates.
employee_responsibilities: Employees should read this Policy prior to planning and incurring business expenses.
Employees must abide by this policy and report all expenses promptly and accurately with relevant documentation.
content_en.policy_owner: Accounting Dept. in connection with the Administration Dept.

general_policy.description: The Company reimburses employees for reasonable and necessary expenditures with a genuine business purpose.
general_policy.philosophy: The Company encourages frugality in business expenditures to stay lean and agile.
examples: Use phone calls and video conferencing instead of business travel where possible.
Employees of the same gender are recommended to share a room to save costs.
general_policy.consequences: Expense reimbursement not in compliance with this policy may be declined. Fraudulent acts may lead to dismissal or reporting to authorities.

entertainment_and_meals.description: Business entertainment and meal expenses can be incurred for legitimate business purposes.
criteria: The recipient must have a potential or actual business dealing with the Company.
The expenditure must precede or follow a business discussion that benefits the Company.
hospitality_requirements: Good taste and occurs at a business-appropriate venue
Must not violate any laws or standards of business conduct
entertainment_and_meals.approval: The expenditure must be within the budget and approved by the business unit/functional group head.

business_travel.definition: Business travel refers to an employee required to travel outside their base city for business purposes.
allowable_expenses: Transport between home and airport, airport and hotel, between cities
Expenses related to travel purposes, such as conference fees, visa fees, etc.
Local transport costs between hotel and work/meeting venue
Incidentals like SIM cards, Wi-Fi, laundry

travel_request.description: Travel requests must include a travel budget approved by a director or above before travel.
guidelines: Travel requests should be submitted for approval one month before travel to receive better rates.
Unreasonably incurred costs due to lack of planning may not be reimbursed.
travel_request.self_booking: Employees can self-book if cheaper rates are found, but they must submit a quote from the Admin Dept.

air_ticketing.booking_responsibility: Admin personnel will book the lowest available airfare for all flights.
incremental_costs: Employees requesting higher airfare for frequent flyer miles must bear the incremental cost.
considerations: Reliability and safety of the airline
Reasonable flight connections and travel time
Refundable/flexible tickets if approved by a department director

ground_transportation.economical_travel: Employees should use the most economical travel arrangement.
reimbursable_transport: Transport between overseas airport and hotel/work venue
Mileage for personal vehicle if allowed by local tax authorities

car_rental.description: Car rental is an option in cities where it is more economical.

reimbursement_requirements.vehicle_size: Compact/economy vehicle; upgrades allowed if justified.
reimbursement_requirements.fuel: Company reimburses for fuel but not on-site refueling.
reimbursement_requirements.insurance: Basic car rental insurance is reimbursable.

policy: The Company will pay for accommodation for business travel requiring an overnight stay.
Employees must choose a contracted hotel if available, or expenses must not exceed contracted rates.
accommodation.preferred_pricing: The Company usually has preferred pricing agreements with local hotels for popular destinations.
long_travel: Stays over 2 weeks will be negotiated for discounts.
Short-term apartment rentals may be arranged for longer stays.

travel_allowance.description: A daily allowance covers meals, transportation, and incidentals.

allowance_rates.country_city: Hong Kong, Singapore, South Korea, Taiwan
Mainland, SE Asia (Indonesia, Thailand, etc.), Brazil, Turkey

conditions: Allowance does not cover in-flight time or personal travel days.
Receipts must be submitted even if claiming per diem.

foreign_currency.proof_of_conversion: Expense reports must include proof of currency conversion rates.

incidental_expenses.description: Incidental business expenses must be small amounts and comply with procurement policy.
incidental_expenses.upfront_payment: Exceptional cases must include justification for upfront payment by the employee.

non_reimbursable_expenses: Personal items like luggage, clothing, cosmetics
Commuting costs between home and work
Credit card fees and interest expenses

timely_submission: Employees should submit expense reports promptly, ideally following each calendar month.
Reports submitted after 30 days require justification and may be rejected.
valid_receipts: Receipts must be authentic, clear, and complete.
Credit card statements are not valid receipts.
Employees must retrieve lost receipts from vendors if possible.
expense_submission.management_approval: Expenses must be approved by the employee's superior and must include valid documentation.
expense_submission.audit: Reimbursement submissions will be audited periodically, and false claims may lead to disciplinary actions.

definition_business_travel_and_relocatio.accommodation: Hotel / Rental Apartment, whichever is lower cost

transportation: Employees working beyond 9 pm may claim expenses for transport back home.
Premium transportation requires justification and approval.

content_cn.适用范围: 本政策适用于安塔尔法公司及其附属公司的员工的个人费用报销。
员工责任: 员工在计划和发生商务费用（包括但不限于商务旅行和招待）之前应阅读本政策。
员工必须遵守本政策，并及时、准确地报告所有与公司业务相关的费用，并附上相关证明文件。
content_cn.政策负责人: 会计部门与行政部门共同管理。

通用政策.描述: 公司将报销员工因业务目的发生的合理和必要的支出。
通用政策.理念: 公司鼓励员工在业务支出上保持节俭，以保持精简和灵活。
指南: 如果电话或视频会议能满足业务需求，应避免商务旅行。
鼓励员工与同性同事共享酒店房间以节约成本。
不符合本政策或其理念的支出可能被拒绝。
公司不容忍提交非法发票或伪造费用报销。

招待与餐饮.描述: 商务招待和餐饮费用可以因合法的业务目的而发生。
标准: 接待对象必须与公司有潜在或实际的业务往来。
支出必须与业务讨论直接相关或紧随其后，且对公司有利。
招待要求: 必须在适合商业场合的地点进行。
在业务背景下必须合理和适当。
不得违反任何法律或任何方的商业行为标准。
招待与餐饮.审批: 招待费用必须在部门预算内并由负责部门负责人批准。

商务旅行.定义: 商务旅行指员工因业务需要离开其常驻城市的旅行。

海外商务招待: 与旅行目的直接相关的费用（注册费、签证费、场地预定费、疫苗接种等）

餐费.描述: 酒店与工作/会议地点之间的本地交通费用

杂项费用.描述: 如SIM卡、WiFi费用、洗衣费等自付费用

出差申请.描述: 出差申请包括由董事或以上级别批准的出差预算，员工应至少提前一个月提交申请。
出差申请.自行预订: 如员工找到更便宜的价格，可自行预订并提交报价以获得报销。

机票预订.预订责任: 行政部门将为所有航班预订最低可用票价。
考虑因素: 航空公司的可靠性和安全记录。
合理的航班衔接和旅行时间。
如经部门主管批准，可选购可退款的机票。
机票预订.铁路/轮船: 应选择标准/经济/二等舱座位。

地面交通.经济出行: 员工应选择最经济的交通方式，例如使用机场快线或地铁。

可报销项目.描述: 与商务出行相关的费用可以报销。

要求.燃料: 在租车期间的燃料费用可以报销。
要求.保险: 基本的车辆租赁保险可以报销。

地面交通.不可报销项目: 日常通勤费用、超过24小时的长期停车费用、交通违规罚款

住宿.描述: 公司将支付员工在常驻城市外的商务旅行住宿费用。
住宿.优选价格: 使用合同酒店享受折扣价格，如果没有合同，则遵循该地区的标准价格。
住宿.合并个人旅行: 如果合并个人旅行，额外费用需由员工自行承担。

长期住宿.超过两周: 对于超过两周的住宿，将进行折扣谈判。
长期住宿.短期公寓租赁: 对于较长的住宿时间，可安排短期公寓租赁。

差旅津贴.描述: 差旅津贴用于支付商务旅行期间的餐费、交通费和杂项费用。

津贴标准.国家/城市: 中国大陆、东南亚（印度尼西亚、泰国等）、巴西、土耳其

条件: 津贴不包括个人旅行或飞行时间。
即使申请津贴，也必须提交收据。

外币费用.汇率证明: 费用报告中必须包含货币兑换率的证明。

零星费用.描述: 零星商务费用应为小额并符合采购政策。

不可报销费用: 个人物品（如行李、化妆品）
商务旅行中的意外损失
家与工作地点之间的通勤费用

提交指南: 费用应及时报告以供审计。
超过30天的迟交报告需要有效的理由。
有效收据: 收据必须是真实、清晰和完整的。
信用卡对账单不是有效的收据。
员工应尽一切努力获取丢失的收据。
费用提交.管理审批: 费用必须由员工的上级批准。
费用提交.审计: 公司将定期进行审计，提交虚假报销的行为将导致纪律处分。

差旅和调动定义.住宿: 酒店或租赁公寓，以较低成本为准

差旅和调动定义.机票: 按人力资源定义的调动包
差旅和调动定义.住宿: 按人力资源定义的调动包

加班交通.描述: 员工在晚上9点后工作可申请回家的交通费用。
